entry.p: In my copious spare time I've been reading the following books of late:

ul.li: This Is Your Brain On Music by Daniel Levitin
Restoring the Lost Constitution by Randy Barnett
The Cultural Origins of Human Cognition by Michael Tomasello
Aristotle's Ethics in the fine translation by Terence Irwin
Before the Dawn by Nicholas Wade

entry.p: I doubt I'll have time to report on them here, but they're all pretty interesting so far.
